title: Beta Test
description: Fourteen people from many walks of life are invited to beta test an innovative and unique type of Virtual Reality online game. Their excitement and wonder soon turns to fear as they discover that VR has been taken to a new and frightening level...This is the first volume in a series of novelette length stories chronicling the journeys of the Alter-Realms players as they explore this strange and dangerous new world they've found themselves in.16,000 words / 65 pages standard print
author: J.M. Crouse
